content: It's just, well, the story with that parrot is kinda, *ahem* embarrassing. That's why I didn't tell you right away. Anyway...
info: 萨飞里感谢-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: Oh! Your reward! Got anything you'd like? Back in my hometown, there's a custom: if you tell your wish to the wind, it'll come true the next time a tumbleweed rolls by.
info: 萨飞里感谢-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: {A虎啸}<style=SizeBig>Ha!</style> Bahati sana! You actually found it — this little{短暂停} <style=SizeBig>feather</style> stuck to the fruit!
info: 萨飞里感谢-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: Oh, I see. No problem at all!
info: 萨飞里感谢-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: {A虎掌碎石}Let's see... this one? Nope. That one? Hmm...{短暂停} nope again.
info: 萨飞里感谢-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}*ahem* I mean, I can help make your wish come true. As long as it's something I can do, just say the word... My ears and I will always be here for you.
info: 萨飞里感谢-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: {A加油}Asante sana! If it weren't for you, I'd probably still have to spend days searching for it.
info: 萨飞里感谢-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: {A害羞挠头}Ahem, the treasure...{短暂停} is this feather. It's the coming-of-age gift I prepared for my little brother. Without it, the ceremony won't be complete.
info: 萨飞里感谢-萨飞里_主流程文本3

content: You have no idea how skittish that parrot was! I only managed to snatch this feather because it was totally distracted while performing its mating dance... I swear, I used every single hunting trick in the book!
info: 萨飞里感谢-萨飞里_主流程文本3
